name: Purrrball
description:
Purrrball is a soccer game with cats...

...and lasers.

To win in this game you will have to move the laser, making the cat push the ball towards the goal.

This game was made in 48h in the Málaga Jam VI under the theme "attraction". (Cats are attracted by lasers, OKAY?)

2 Gamepads are mandatory for now, we hope to fix that soon
